description: This Java class defines a NotificationService responsible for dispatching notifications regarding price drops. It includes a method to notify via email and webhooks based on user preferences.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class for sending notifications about price drops, with placeholder implementation for email and webhook integrations.

methods.name: notifyPriceDrop
methods.description: Method to notify a user of a price drop via email and/or webhook based on their preferences.
